references.paper_title: From molecules to materials: Pretraining large generalizable models for atomic property prediction
references.reason: This paper introduces a multi-domain pretraining approach (JMP) that is frequently used as a baseline and comparison in the current work.

references.paper_title: Open Catalyst 2020 (OC20) dataset and community challenges
references.reason: This paper introduces the OC20 dataset, a large-scale dataset used for pretraining in many molecular machine learning works, which is frequently compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: The open catalyst 2022 (OC22) dataset and challenges for oxide electrocatalysts
references.reason: This paper introduces the OC22 dataset, another large-scale dataset used for pretraining that is frequently compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: The ANI-1ccx and ANI-1x data sets, coupled-cluster and density functional theory properties for molecules
references.reason: This paper introduces the ANI-1x dataset, a high-quality dataset that is shown to be highly relevant for downstream tasks in this paper.

references.paper_title: Transfer learning using attentions across atomic systems with graph neural networks (TAAG)
references.reason: This paper explores transfer learning for atomic property prediction and is compared against in this work.
